com.davidbracewell.io.structured

Interface StructuredFormat

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable

    public interface StructuredFormat
extends Serializable
    Defines a common interface for creating structured readers and writers
    Author:
    David B. Bracewell

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static StructuredFormat JSON
      JSON Format
      static StructuredFormat XML
      XML Format

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      StructuredReader createReader(Resource resource)
      Creates a new Structured Reader reading from the given resource.
      StructuredWriter createWriter(Resource resource)
      Creates a new Structured Writer writing to the given resource.
      default String dumps(Map<String,?> map)
      Dumps a map in this format to a string.
      default Map<String,Val> loads(Resource resource)
      Reads the resource in the format to a map.
      default Map<String,Val> loads(String data)
      Reads the resource in the format to a map.

      • createReader

        StructuredReader createReader(Resource resource)
                       throws IOException
        Creates a new Structured Reader reading from the given resource.
        Parameters:
        resource - the resource to read from
        Returns:
        the structured reader
        Throws:
        IOException - Something went wrong initializing the reader

      • createWriter

        StructuredWriter createWriter(Resource resource)
                       throws IOException
        Creates a new Structured Writer writing to the given resource.
        Parameters:
        resource - the resource to write from
        Returns:
        the structured writer
        Throws:
        IOException - Something went wrong initializing the writer

      • loads

        default Map<String,Val> loads(Resource resource)
                       throws IOException
        Reads the resource in the format to a map.
        Parameters:
        resource - the resource
        Returns:
        the data in the resource as a map
        Throws:
        IOException - something went wrong reading the resource

      • loads

        default Map<String,Val> loads(String data)
        Reads the resource in the format to a map.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the data in the resource as a map

        default String dumps(@NonNull
                     Map<String,?> map)

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the string representation of the map
